page.title: 11Care Of The Elderly
page.content: The old peoples'homes in this area are The Laurels,Bryn Dar,Tegfan,The British Legion Homes and The Gadlys Homes. The Laurels is a small nursing home for old people.It can only cater for about 15_20 old people.The Laurels is a private home so the elderly have to pay to be cared for.This expense comes to about Â£100 a week.The nursing home will not accept the elderly unless they can walk up the stairs and around the home. Tegfan is a place for the elderly which is paid for by the country. Tegfan caters mostly for old people who can't look after themselves.Some old pensioners come to Tegfan for 1_2 days to be looked after,or to meet old friends.They can have their hair cut or washed,they are bathed and fed and do all sorts of different activities.
